channel.title: Beethoven Challenge!
channel.description:
Hey guys! Haven’t seen a contest posted in a while so here’s a simple idea. Make a song without it vet hearing it.
Rules:
- you are only allowed to hear it after you have posted it to the thread - no imported drum loops or melodic loops are allowed (Imported one shots like drum one shots and melodic tones are allowed) - you are not allowed to copy loops and Melodies from other projects - don’t cheat! It ruins it for everyone
I know everyone is thinking that there is a big flaw with this contest which is that people can easily cheat, which they can, but guys please don’t because it ruins it for everyone.
Have fun!

item.title: Beethoven Challenge!

item.description:

item.title: Beethoven Challenge!
item.dc:creator: Kensei
item.description:
Hey guys! Haven’t seen a contest posted in a while so here’s a simple idea. Make a song without it vet hearing it.

Rules:

  • you are only allowed to hear it after you have posted it to the thread
  • no imported drum loops or melodic loops are allowed (Imported one shots like drum one shots and melodic tones are allowed)
  • you are not allowed to copy loops and Melodies from other projects
  • don’t cheat! It ruins it for everyone

I know everyone is thinking that there is a big flaw with this contest which is that people can easily cheat, which they can, but guys please don’t because it ruins it for everyone.

Have fun!

Read full topic
